sense.def:
To take something off something else
pomeni vzeti nekaj z nečesa drugega. Kadar nekaj
moves or comes off
, odstopi ali se odlepi.

seg.quote: He took his hand off her arm.
He was wiping sweat off his face.
The paint was peeling off.
He took off his jacket.

sense.def:
To get off a bus, train, or plane
pomeni izstopiti iz avtobusa, vlaka ali letala.

seg.quote: The train stopped and people got off.

sense.def:
To go off
pomeni oditi iz kraja, kjer smo bili.

seg.quote: He started the motor and drove off abruptly.
When are you off to America?

sense.def:
To keep off a street or piece of land
pomeni, da v neko ulico ali kraj ne zahajamo.

seg.quote: I kept off the main roads.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo
off somewhere
ali
off doing something
, je nekje drugje kot mi.

seg.quote: She's off in Florida at some labour conference.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
off a place
, je blizu tistega kraja.

seg.quote: ...two islands off the mainland of China.
...a hotel just off the Via Condotti.

sense.def:
Kadar je zemljišče
walled off
ali
fenced off
, ga obdaja zid ali ograja, ki ga loči od okolice, bodisi vse naokoli ali samo spredaj.

seg.quote: The area surrounding the office had been cordoned off.

sense.def:
To fight something off
ali
to keep something off
pomeni nekaj odgnati ali preprečiti.

seg.quote: I could no longer ward off thoughts of my imprisonment.

sense.def:
To have some time off
pomeni, da nam nekaj časa ni treba hoditi v službo.

seg.quote: I would love to have a year off.

sense.def:
Kdor je
off work
, ne dela, ker je bolan.

Stroj ali električna razsvetljava je
off
, kadar ne deluje.

seg.quote: Boylan switched off the headlights.
He turned the radio off.

sense.def:
Dogovor ali predviden dogodek, ki je
off
, je odjavljen.

seg.quote: I presume the deal is off.

sense.def:
Pijača ali hrana, ki je
off
, ima neprijeten okus in vonj, ker je že pokvarjena.

seg.quote: The wine was off.

sense.def:
To be off something
pomeni nečesa ne uporabljati ali ne marati več;

seg.quote: My father was off alcohol.
He's gone off liberty.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
a long time off
, se še dolgo časa ne bo zgodilo.

seg.quote: Control over the mind is not as far off as we think.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj dogaja
off and on
, se dogaja v presledkih.
